Some archaeologists have speculated that the Ambum Stone represented a totemic animal, while others suggest that the Ambum Stone was

choices.label: an elaborate handle for a pitcher
a tool used to grind or pound substances
an effigy symbolizing a sacrificial victim
an object that was mounted on a staff and indicated social rank

topic.text: 1.3: Theories and Interpretations of Prehistoric Art

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Describe one or more art historically relevant interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art), its reception, or its meaning.
